author: Michael E. Ruane
title: Putin cites ‘genocide’ in Ukraine. He’s right: Jews were slaughtered there 80 years ago.
description: Over two days in 1941, Nazi killing squads executed more than 33,000 people at Babyn Yar.
content: Today, the notorious site is inside Kyiv city limits. Its called Babyn Yar, or Babi Yar, and the invading Russian soldiers fighting to subdue the city might notice the monuments to those who were mur… [+5515 chars]
